703755f-a.title: Brooklyn: Columbia Street - Creamer Street
703755f-a.text:
Columbia Street, east side, south from the N.E. corner of
Creamer and Columbia Streets, showing at the aforerentioned
corner the Berg Varnish Co. lInc. building. Beyond it occupying
the block between Creamer and Bay Street is the H. Hobnstamn
and Co. builcing. They are manufacturers of dry colors.
June 9, 1938.
P. L. Sperr
NO RTPRODUCTIONS.
703755f-a.folder: Columbia Street & Creamer Street, Brooklyn, NY
